TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase

summary.span: 提供对配置文件属性值和信息的非类型化访问。

span.span: Provides untyped access to profile property values and information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用并方法的基类，以检索并分别将配置文件设置属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 实例`ProfileCommon`类设置的值为ASP.NET 应用程序的属性。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. 若要在 ASP.NET 应用程序中创建用户配置文件的实例，建议你使用方法。To create an instance of a user profile in an ASP.NET application, it is recommended that you use the method. ## 对继承者的说明Notes to Inheritors 可以创建继承的自定义配置文件实现抽象类，并定义用户配置文件的配置元素中未指定的属性。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element. 可以在 web.config 文件中指定自定义用户配置文件类型`inherits`配置元素，如下面的示例中所示的属性。You can specify a custom user-profile type in the web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element, as shown in the following example. 有关代码`EmployeeProfile`类包含在本主题的示例部分。The code for the `EmployeeProfile` class is included in the Example section of this topic. [!code-xml[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase-Config](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/config.xml)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 Web.config 文件，指定包含的用户配置文件`ZipCode`类型的属性`string`和一个`RecentSearchList`类型的属性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 生成属性与当前将具有强类型化访问器为每个指定的属性。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ```xml ``` 下面的示例演示在 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 然后再尝试运行此代码，设置为默认的提供程序`AspNetSqlProvider`在网站上的 ASP.NET 配置设置。Before attempting to run this code, set the provider to the default `AspNetSqlProvider` in the ASP.NET configuration settings for the Web site. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例定义继承的类类，以创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 中指定的自定义配置文件的类型`inherits`应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的配置元素的属性。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用并方法的基类，以检索并分别将配置文件设置属性值。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the and methods of the base class to retrieve and set profile property values, respectively. 实例`ProfileCommon`类设置的值为ASP.NET 应用程序的属性。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property for the ASP.NET application. > [!NOTE] > 用于生成存储中的类的基类可以使用重写属性`inherits`属性配置文件的一部分。The base class used to generate the class stored in the property can be overridden using the `inherits` attribute of the section of the configuration file. 在这种情况下将指定的自定义类继承自基类。In this case you would specify a custom class that inherits from the base class. 此构造函数不是应用程序代码中使用。This constructor is not intended to be used from application code. 若要创建用户配置文件的实例，使用方法。To create an instance of a user profile, use the method. ## Examples 以下 Web.config 文件指定包含的用户配置文件`ZipCode`类型的属性`string`和一个`RecentSearchList`类型的属性。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains a `ZipCode` property of type `string` and a `RecentSearchList` property of type . 生成属性与当前将具有强类型化访问器为每个指定的属性。The generated property of the current will have strongly typed accessors for each of the specified properties. ```xml ``` 以下 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建并初始化新的配置文件实例并使用自定义配置文件的应用程序对象或管理用户配置文件在非 ASP.NET 环境中的非常有用。The method creates and initializes a new profile instance and is useful for applications that use a custom profile object or manage user profiles in a non-ASP.NET environment. 此重载方法假设指定的用户名身份验证的用户。This overload of the method assumes that the specified user name is an authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建自定义配置文件对象的实例，设置一个属性，并将该配置文件保存到数据源。The following code example creates an instance of a custom profile object, sets a property, and saves the profile to the data source. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/CS/profileBaseCreatecs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase.Create/VB/profileBaseCreatevb.aspx.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建并初始化新的配置文件实例并使用自定义配置文件的应用程序对象或管理用户配置文件在非 ASP.NET 环境中的非常有用。The method creates and initializes a new profile instance and is useful for applications that use a custom profile object or manage user profiles in a non-ASP.NET environment. 此重载方法可以用于创建身份验证的用户或匿名用户的配置文件。This overload of the method can be used to create a profile for an authenticated user or an anonymous user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建自定义配置文件对象的实例，设置一个属性，并将该配置文件保存到数据源。The following code example creates an instance of a custom profile object, sets a property, and saves the profile to the data source. MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase GetProfileGroup (string groupName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase GetProfileGroup(string groupName) cil managed
Public Function GetProfileGroup (groupName As String) As ProfileGroupBase
public: System::Web::Profile::ProfileGroupBase ^ GetProfileGroup(System::String ^ groupName);
member this.GetProfileGroup : string -> System.Web.Profile.ProfileGroupBase

span.span: The name of the group of properties.

summary.span: 获取按组名标识的属性组。

span.span: Gets a group of properties identified by a group name.

returns.span: 利用指定组名进行配置的属性组的 对象。

span.span: A object for a group of properties configured with the specified group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件属性可分解为更好地组织的组。Profile properties can be separated into groups for better organization. 属性可用来检索属性的一组按组名称。The property can be used to retrieve a group of properties by the group name. 此外可以通过指定组名称作为的成员访问组中的配置文件属性`Profile`每一页上提供的属性。You can also access a profile property in a group by specifying the group name as a member of the `Profile` property available on each page. 例如，`ZipCode`配置文件属性的成员`Address`无法使用访问配置文件组`Profile.Address.ZipCode`。For example, the `ZipCode` profile property that is a member of the `Address` profile group could be accessed using `Profile.Address.ZipCode`. ## Examples 以下 Web.config 文件指定包含组名为的属性组的用户配置文件`Address`。The following Web.config file specifies a user profile that contains group of properties with a group name of `Address`. 为生成的分组的属性属性与当前将前面的组名称。The grouped properties generated for the property of the current will be preceded by the group name. 例如 `Profile.Address.Street`。For example, `Profile.Address.Street`. ```xml ``` 以下 ASP.NET 页面读取并设置为用户配置文件指定的分组的属性。The following ASP.NET page reads and sets the grouped properties specified for the user profile. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileGroupBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 未在配置节中找到指定的配置文件属性组名。

span.span: The specified profile property group name was not found in the configuration section.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

span.span: The name of the profile property.

summary.span: 获取配置文件属性的值。

span.span: Gets the value of a profile property.

returns.span: 指定的配置文件属性的值，类型化为 。

span.span: The value of the specified profile property, typed as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用方法来检索从非类型化的值生成访问器，然后将强制转换为指定类型和属性值的形式返回。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to retrieve untyped values from the that the generated accessor then casts as the specified type and returns as the property value. 可以使用方法来按名称检索你的应用程序的用户配置文件的属性值。You can use the method to retrieve property values of the user profile for your application by name. 返回的值是非类型化，并且必须强制转换为特定对象类型时检索。Returned values are untyped and must be cast as the specific object type when retrieved. 对于配置文件属性值对的强类型访问，可以访问属性按名称在每个页上，提供的配置文件属性的成员等`Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the Profile property available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了在 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 指定用户配置文件的属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Initialize : string * bool -> unit

param.name: username
param.span: 要为其初始化配置文件的用户的名称。

span.span: The name of the user to initialize the profile for.

param.name: isAuthenticated
param.span: 指示用户是经过身份验证的用户； 指示用户是匿名用户。

span.span: to indicate the user is authenticated; to indicate the user is anonymous.

summary.span: 初始化当前用户的配置文件属性值和信息。

span.span: Initializes the profile property values and information for the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不适于在您的代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used from your code. 使用其中一个重载来创建用户配置文件的实例。Use one of the overloads to create an instance of the user profile.

value.span: 如果用户配置文件是用于匿名用户，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user profile is for an anonymous user; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用配置部分启用匿名访问的用户配置文件和`allowAnonymous`用来指定配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the configuration section and the `allowAnonymous` attribute of the configuration element used to specify profile properties.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表明是否修改了任何配置文件属性。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether any of the profile properties have been modified.

value.span: 如果修改了任何配置文件属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if any of the profile properties have been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以由配置文件提供程序期间方法来确定属性是否由组成的基元类型、 字符串或对象已更改。The property can be used by a profile provider during the method to determine whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or objects have been changed. 然后通过中的配置文件提供程序更新已更改的属性方法。Changed properties are then updated by the profile provider in the method. 调用方法时自动页面执行结束时如果属性 `true`The method is automatically called at the end of page execution if the property is `true` 配置文件提供程序中调用方法不能显式确定是否使用自定义类类型或复杂类型，如集合、 配置文件属性已更改。A profile provider called in the method cannot explicitly determine whether a profile property with a custom class type or a complex type, such as a collection, has changed. 可以使用事件以确定是否已修改的自定义对象，然后继续进行自动保存已修改的对象或取消自动保存，如果不修改了任何对象。You can use the event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and to continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified. 默认行为类是设置属性设置为`true`访问属性的自定义或复杂类型的第一个时间属性。The default behavior of the class is to set the property to `true` for properties that are of a custom or complex type the first time the property is accessed.

summary.span: 用已更改的配置文件属性值更新配置文件数据源。

span.span: Updates the profile data source with changed profile property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将修改后的配置文件属性值写入到数据源。The method writes modified profile property values to the data source. 配置文件提供程序可以减少在数据源的活动量执行更新时，才属性设置为`true`。The profile provider can reduce the amount of activity at the data source by performing updates only when the property is set to `true`. 这是默认情况下。This is the case for the default . 之后方法将属性值保存到数据源设置为`false`。After the method has saved the property values to the data source, is set to `false`. 可以使用事件，以便实现确定是否已修改一个配置文件属性与自定义类型或复杂类型的自定义逻辑和继续自动保存修改的对象或如果没有对象具有取消自动保存已修改。You can use the event to implement custom logic that determines whether a profile property with a custom type or a complex type has been modified and continue with the automatic save for modified objects or cancel the automatic save if no objects have been modified.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: The name of the property to set.
The value to assign to the property.

summary.span: 设置配置文件属性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 使用类，以创建用户配置文件使用的类。ASP.NET uses the class to create the class used for the user profile. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`配置节中定义的每个属性的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property defined in the configuration section. 强类型化访问器`ProfileCommon`类调用方法来传递属性值复制到要存储在数据源。The strongly typed accessors of the `ProfileCommon` class call the method to pass property values to the to be stored at the data source. 可以使用方法来按名称指定应用程序的用户配置文件中的属性值。You can use the method to assign property values in the user profile for your application by name. 值为非类型化，并在运行时，不是编译时将执行类型检查。Values are untyped, and type checking will be done at run time, not compile time. 强类型化访问配置文件属性值，您可以将属性按名称访问作为的成员`Profile`属性可在每一页上，例如， `Profile.CustomerAddress`。For strongly typed access to profile property values, you can access the property by name as a member of the `Profile` property that is available on each page, for example, `Profile.CustomerAddress`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了在 ASP.NET 页面读取，并设置`ZipCode`为用户配置文件指定的属性。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that reads and sets the `ZipCode` property specified for the user profile. 指定用户配置文件的属性的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅为提供的示例类。For an example of a Web.config file that specifies properties for the user profile, see the example provided for the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/CS/defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.HttpProfileBase/VB/defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取该配置文件的用户名。

span.span: Gets the user name for the profile.

value.span: 配置文件的用户名，或分配给配置文件的匿名用户标识符。

span.span: The user name for the profile or the anonymous-user identifier assigned to the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的经过身份验证的用户的配置文件与之关联的名称，或者如果分配给该配置文件的匿名用户标识符属性是`true`。The property returns either the name of the authenticated user that the profile is associated with or the anonymous user identifier assigned to the profile if the property is `true`. 使用配置部分启用匿名访问的用户配置文件和`allowAnonymous`用来指定配置文件属性的配置元素的属性。Anonymous access to the user profile is enabled using the configuration section and the `allowAnonymous` attribute of the configuration element used to specify profile properties.

related.span: ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述

span.span: ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview
